item.title: Get to know one's Personality Type
item.description: Myers-Briggs Personality Type Way to identify the personality type of the person, his/her strengths, and preferences in life. Based on the set of questions and answers to it, oneâ€™s personality type can be assessed. So, here we go, choose your response, and pick the letter corresponding to that set of questions if you agree. The questions fall under four categories which are described below. 1. A
item.dc:creator: Leela Vasundhara
